title: Grandview Ave.-Cleveland Heights, CWRU-Univ Hosp-Clev. Clinic
map_address: Grandview Ave near West St James Parkway
posting_body: ['Quiet, clean apartment in a well-maintained 4 suite building.', 'Two bedrooms, living room, dining room with built-in china cabinets; window seat', 'Bright, airy sunroom off living room.', 'Ceiling fans; hardwood floors.', 'Stove, refrigerator, dishwasher in kitchen', 'No pets.', 'Parking on street.', 'Onsite laundry and extra storage in basement.', 'New highly-efficient hot water heat with individually controlled thermostat.', 'Heat and other utilities are not included in the rent.', 'Water, sewer, trash fees are included in the rent.', 'One year lease required with one month’s rent as security deposit.', 'Walkable neighborhood to grocery, drug stores, banks, bus lines, restaurants.', 'Minutes drive or bike to CWRU, University Circle; Cleveland Clinic.', 'Ideal for professionals working in the area or students.', 'RTA bus stop on corner of street along with CWRU shuttle stop at end of the street.', 'Minutes drive to museums, Clev.', 'Orchestra, Nature Center, and parks.', 'Available August 5, 2022', 'Contact Paula', 'show contact info', 'for more information.', ' Please leave your name and phone number on the answering machine.']
